mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deliver_address (da_no, da_type, us_no, sel_no, da_name, da_tel, da_postcode, da_adr, da_detail_adr, da_main, da_req_type) VALUES (da_no_seq.nextval, #{da_type}, #{us_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sel_no, jdbcType=INTEGER} null, #{da_name}, #{da_tel}, #{da_postcode}, #{da_adr}, #{da_detail_adr}, #{da_main}, #{da_req_type})
mapper.select: select da_no, da_type, us_no, sel_no, da_name, da_tel, da_postcode, da_adr, da_detail_adr, da_main, get_code_value('DA', da_req_type) as da_req_type from deliver_address where us_no = #{us_no} and da_main = 'Y'
select codeval from code where groupvalue = 'DELIVER_ADDRESS_DA_REQ_TYPE' and code = #{da_req_type}
mapper.update: update deliver_address SET da_main = 'N' where us_no = #{us_no}
